property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you discover the last clue at your location: Search the top X cards of your deck for a Charm or Relic asset and play it, reducing its cost by X. X is the printed shroud of your location. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +1. Gain 1 resource for each Charm asset and each Relic asset you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbulding Options: Rogue cards (ν) level 0-3, Charm and Relic cards level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 5 other Seeker cards (λ) level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Trusty Bullwhip, Buried Secrets, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Monterey Jack deck only. Advanced. η: Fight. This attack uses ί instead of ή. You get +2 skill value for this attack. If this attack succeeds, you may exhaust Trusty Bullwhip to deal +1 damage for this attack and automatically evade the attacked enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Advanced. Revelation – Put Buried Secrets into play in your threat area. If your location can be investigated, you cannot move except by scenario card effects. ηη: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Buried Secrets.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is the number of locations with 1 or more doom on them. β: –1. If you are poisoned, reveal another token. γ: –3. If you fail, place 1 doom on your location. δ: –3. If you fail, the nearest ready unengaged Serpent enemy moves once toward your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is 1 more than the number of locations with 1 or more doom on them. β: –2. If you are poisoned, reveal another token. γ: –4. Place 1 doom on your location. δ: –5. After this test resolves, the nearest ready unengaged Serpent enemy moves once toward your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda gets +1π doom threshold. Forced – When this agenda advances: Do not remove doom from locations in play. Forced – When an investigator is defeated: That investigator shuffles each Ancient story asset they control into the exploration deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Retaliate. Spawn – Engaged with Monterey Jack. Dweller in the Pit gets +1 π health and +1 fight for each vengence point in the victory display (max +3 fight). Forced – After the Dweller in the Pit deals damage to you, check your supplies: If you do not have the satchel, shuffle each Ancient asset you control into the exploration deck. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda gets +1π doom threshold. Forced – When this agenda advances: Do not remove doom from locations in play. Forced – When an investigator is defeated: That investigator shuffles each Ancient story asset they control into the exploration deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator who has not been eliminated is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If there are no clues on your location: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective – When each surviving investigator is at Inner Chamber, they may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move each unengaged Elite enemy directly to Inner Chamber. Shuffle each of the following cards into the exploration deck: Each of the set-aside Ancient story assets, the set-aside Vengeant Past treachery, each single-sided location in play, and 1 copy of the set-aside Brood of Yig enemy for each vengeance point in the victory display. Place 1π clues on each revealed location (up to a maximum of its clue threshold).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If there are no clues on your location: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective – Get out with as many Ancient relics as you can! If each surviving investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If Secret Passage is connected to your location, put it and the set-aside Inner Chamber into play. Otherwise, shuffle it into the exploration deck. Forced – After you enter Secret Passage: Check your supplies. If you have the compass, discover 1 clue from Secret Passage. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend X clues: Reveal the top X cards of the exploration deck. Draw 1 of the revealed cards and check your supplies. If you have chalk, you may choose 1 additional card and draw it. Shuffle the remaining cards into the exploration deck. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After doom is placed on Ancient Hall: Shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the exploration deck. Any investigator at Ancient Hall may spend 3 resources to cancel this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Jade Crocodile into play under your control. You must either place 1 doom on your location, or take 2 damage. Forced – When you resign: Add Jade Crocodile to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Obsidian Jaguar into play under your control. You must either place 1 doom on your location, or the nearest enemy attacks you. Forced – When you resign: Add Obsidian Jaguar to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Citrine Snake into play under your control. If you are poisoned, take 1 direct damage. If you are not poisoned, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area. Forced – When you resign: Add Citrine Snake to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Turquoise Eagle into play under your control. You must either place 1 doom on your location, or take 2 horror. Forced – When you resign: Add Turquoise Eagle to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – For each Ancient story asset controlled by an investigator, you must either (choose one): —Deal 1 damage or horror to that asset's controller. —Shuffle that asset into the exploration deck. After this effect resolves, shuffle Vengeant Past into the exploration deck.
